name: Random Squares v1
description: I was inspired by Herbert W. Franke and his random Squares. The natrual chaos of different squares made it possible to dig deeper into what is possible with a simple shape. Just starting with simple steps and adding more and more features to the art.

name: Random Squares v2
description: These squares are a modified version of the first version of the Random Squares by Gerbert W. Franke. The main different now is that random squares have a decreased opacity than others. This creates more depth into the art.

name: Random Squares v3
description: So far the artwork had been quite boring with just black and white. With a pop of color and a decreased opacity, this reminds me of colored glass windows. I implemented a random function for the color pop and opacity.

name: Increasing Circles
description: I got inspired by an artwork from Vera Molnar. Instead of using noise, I used map instead to create this satisfying increase of the size of the ellipses.

name: Falling Circles
description: The falling circles are a variation of the increasing circles. This shows the difference the movement has on our perception. To create the falling effect I rotated the square.

name: Moving Circles
description: To create more active movement in this artwork, I decided to add a noise. I kept the position of the big square at the same place, as I liked the inital start and keeping a few aspects of the original drawing by Vera Molnar.

name: Thunder
description: I was inspired by an artwork Garrit made. I started to play around with the code and ended up with thunder that reminds me of the northern methologies.

name: Recreation Artwork v1
description: I found this artwork by Ahmad Moussa and tried to recreate it. It is said that it was created with perlin noise as well, but I tried to recreate it without.

name: Recreation Artwork v2
description: Now I wanted the lines to go in another direction with other colours that represent the upcoming winter.

name: Wave
description: I was inspired to crate a spinning animation with some guidence.

name: test
description: Since I haven't made anything with particles yet. I followed a simple video creating to create particles moving over the screen.

name: Spheres
description: For the 3rd week I wanted to try around more with particles and then found a video about creating 3D particles. It reminds me of older animation styles.
